plot: A Vegetarian Pizza Man sets out on prom night to kill people that order meat! A group of teens have a house to themselves when the pizza man shows up. Horror and Comedy ensues.
title: Red Sauce!
plot_es: A Vegetarian Pizza Man sets out on prom night to kill people that order meat! A group of teens have a house to themselves when the pizza man shows up. Horror and Comedy ensues.
plot_en: A Vegetarian Pizza Man sets out on prom night to kill people that order meat! A group of teens have a house to themselves when the pizza man shows up. Horror and Comedy ensues.
